top_comment.text: I generally dislike Rand Paul. But I like this﻿
top_comment.author: jacksmackcrackiswack

comments.text:
i like his economic positions and opposition against the NSA, and that's 
pretty much it. I think some of his other positions are too 'conservative'
comments.author: jacksmackcrackiswack

top_comment.text:
Was Rand Paul happy to support the PATRIOT ACT?. It gave greater powers to 
the President of the day...which BTY...was signed by George W Bush.

He's using this not as an attack on civil liberties - but on Obama.﻿
top_comment.author: trevor bell

comments.text:
Don't be a deedeedee, neither him nor his father will ever vote for bigger 
government, ESPECIALLY Ron Paul. You're not teaching that old dog any new 
tricks.
comments.author: Shane Howard

comments.text:
Rand Paul vehemently opposed the Patriot Act. So no he was definitely not 
happy to support it.
comments.author: Juan Garcia

comments.text: he did not back the patriot act.
comments.author: aj m

comments.text:
To my knowledge he voted no.. He's a libertarian.. kinda.. I don't know why 
he would vote for it.
comments.author: Gary Sanders
